00008 FactoredApproximatorMinUpdates::FactoredApproximatorMinUpdates(Approximators approximators, bool splitObs)
00009     : FactoredApproximator::FactoredApproximator(approximators, splitObs) {
00010 
00011     lastUpdateTime.resize(approximators.size());
00012     hasBeenEligible.resize(approximators.size());
00013     hasBeenEligibleLongTerm.resize(approximators.size());
00014 
00015     currentTime = 0;
00016     lastUpdateTime.clear();
00017     hasBeenEligible.clear();
00018     hasBeenEligibleLongTerm.clear();
00019 }
00020 
00021 void FactoredApproximatorMinUpdates::doApprox(Observation& obs, Vector& output) {
00022     FactoredApproximator::doApprox(obs, output);
00023     eligible = &(obs.getEligible());
00024 
00025     for (uint i = 0; i < approximators.size(); i++)
00026         if ((*eligible)[i]) {
00027             hasBeenEligible[i] = true;
00028             hasBeenEligibleLongTerm[i] = true;
00029         }
00030 }

00041 void FactoredApproximatorMinUpdates::discountTrace() {
00042 
00043     currentTime++;
00044 
00045     int j=0;
00046     Approximators::iterator i;
00047     for (i = approximators.begin(); i != approximators.end(); i++) {
00048         if ((*eligible)(j)) {
00049             if (hasBeenEligible(j)) {
00050                 (*i)->setDiscount(pow(discount, currentTime - lastUpdateTime(j)));
00051                 (*i)->discountTrace();
00052             }
00053             lastUpdateTime(j) = currentTime;
00054         }
00055         j++;
00056     }
00057 }

00060 void FactoredApproximatorMinUpdates::setDiscount(double discount) {
00061     this->discount = discount;
00062 }

00064 
00065 void FactoredApproximatorMinUpdates::instantStep(double reward) {
00066 
00067     for (uint i = 0; i < approximators.size(); i++) {
00068         if (reward != 0.0) {
00069             if (hasBeenEligible(i)) {
00070                 if (!(*eligible)(i)) {
00071                     // If action eligible, trace has already been updated
00072                     approximators[i]->setDiscount(pow(discount, currentTime - lastUpdateTime(i)));
00073                     approximators[i]->discountTrace();
00074                     lastUpdateTime(i) = currentTime;
00075                 }
00076                 approximators[i]->instantStep(reward);
00077             }
00078         }
00079     }
00080 }
